version_description:
Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We update our app as often as possible to make your driving experience even better.

Changes in this version include:
- Onboarding call - update navigation to direct the driver to the relevant calendar.

Questions or feedback? We're here to help: info@sherpa.net.au

Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We update our app as often as possible to make your driving experience even better.

Changes in this version include:

With summer around the corner, we’re going to give you a weekly reminder to keep your vehicle cool for jobs with perishables (such as food and flowers).

Jobs with items heavier than 15kg will be highlighted with the “heavy” icon. If you have trouble lifting heavy items, you can set your ‘Delivery Preferences’ to opt out of them.

Support for barcode (beta) - Some businesses require items to be scanned on pickup and delivery. We’ve now added the ability for you to scan barcodes when picking up and delivering individual items in a job.

Questions or feedback? We’re here to help: info@sherpa.net.au

Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We update our app as often as possible to make your driving experience even better.

Changes in this version include:

With summer around the corner, we’re going to give you a weekly reminder to keep your vehicle cool for jobs with perishables (such as food and flowers).

Jobs with items heavier than 15kg will be highlighted with the “heavy” icon. If you have trouble lifting heavy items, you can set your ‘Delivery Preferences’ to opt out of them.

Support for barcode (beta) - Some businesses require items to be scanned on pickup and delivery. We’ve now added the ability for you to scan barcodes when picking up and delivering individual items in a job.

Questions or feedback? We’re here to help: info@sherpa.net.au

Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We update our app as often as possible to make your driving experience even better.

Changes in this version include:

We’ve added two new delivery statuses (Arrived for Pickup and Arrived for Delivery). Inform the pickup contact and/or the recipient when you arrive on location to help reduce the time you have to spend waiting at every stop.

Provide a bit more information about the vehicle you will be using to do Sherpa Deliveries. This includes your vehicle’s registration number and proof of insurance.

If you switch between multiple vehicles to do deliveries, you will now be able to link them all to your Sherpa account.

Questions or feedback? We’re here to help: info@sherpa.net.au

Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We’ve updated the app to reflect our “Contactless Delivery” process during the COVID-19 outbreak.

Changes in this version include:

- Deliveries will no longer require a signature from the recipient. Photo proof, recipient name and relationship will serve as proof of delivery.

-Alcohol deliveries will not require photo proof or signature. They will, however, still require the recipient to provide a valid ID if they appear younger than 30 years of age.

Questions or feedback? We’re here to help: info@sherpa.net.au

Thanks for driving with Sherpa! We update our app as often as possible to make your driving experience even better.

Changes in this version include:

Display wait time fee in delivery price breakdown.

Add more context to your emergency contact (name, number, relationship to you).

Minor UI updates and bug fixes.

Questions or feedback? We’re here to help: info@sherpa.net.au
